sentence: The Generals were able to bring in the high-profile running backs Herschel Walker and Mike Rozier, as well as quarterback Doug Flutie, into the league in one of the most shocking moves in the brief battle between the NFL and USFL.
author: Ryan Gaydos
title: Presidents Day: How US leaders fared in the sporting arena

sentence: Other out-of-state candidates like David McCormick, Ozs chief Republican rival in Pennsylvania, as well as Herschel Walker in Georgia have faced similar scrutiny this year.
title: Sections
